declare @message nvarchar(4000), @filterEvents nvarchar(4000) set @message = '' exec @@sysDatabaseName..AI_ERP$Generate$FilterEvents @@controller, @@event, @filterEvents out set @message = @message + @filterEvents
if (1 = &Tiny.Currency.ConfigEvent; or 1 = &Tiny.External.ConfigEvent;) begin declare @$formFieldAction nvarchar(4000) exec @@sysDatabaseName..AI_ERP$GenerateEvents$FormFieldAction @@controller, @@event, 'sysfilterfield', '1=0&Tiny.Currency.ConfigCondition;&Tiny.External.ConfigCondition;', '@@appDatabaseName', @$formFieldAction out set @message = @message + @$formFieldAction end
select @message as message
